description: Reconnects a session to a managed node after it has been disconnected. Connections can be resumed for disconnected sessions, but not terminated sessions.

parameters.name: SessionId
parameters.description: The ID of the disconnected session to resume.

nested_items.name: TokenValue
nested_items.description: An encrypted token value containing session and caller information. Used to authenticate the connection to the managed node.

nested_items.name: StreamUrl
nested_items.description: A URL back to SSM Agent on the managed node that the Session Manager client uses to send commands and receive output from the managed node. Format: wss://ssmmessages.**region**.amazonaws.com/v1/data-channel/**session-id**?stream=(input|output).
